body: About all the discussion, i don’t want to pick sides. But besides if it has a lot of sex or don’t each person i think everyone has what makes them turn on, and probably we all have something “weird” that makes us want to fap lol. Me for example i have a thing for evil girls and corruption stuff and that is why i got here in the first place. And ratata has a lot of other storys similar to this that i also like. And maybe the fact that it doesn’t have a lot of sex makes me like it even more. One of the reasons i dont like porn is the dicks, it turns me off for some reason, and the fact that most hentais censor that helps me a lot(okay so this one is not censor but still has corruption so i tried to ignore the dicks). And this works for me far better than a lot of sex. So my point is, this works for some people and some don’t. I think it is only fair we judge the art and maybe the story? :/

@TheGuy100, Almost everything in my favourites is unread, i put them there then read them later, i never read anything twice as well, then i delete them. i simply forgot to unfavourite after i read it. but i am seriously considering rethinking that way of doing things if it contributes to this drivel getting more recognition. I will admit i joined the herd at first. i thought there must be something here i am not seeing, i still held out hope because there is nice art and decent storytelling. So i added rat's work. Then i went back and read them and realised rat's work is popular for all the wrong reasons. It just tries to be controversial and give people a talking point. "and that's all" ratat obviously knows this is enough "take his latest works as an example" he is including even less sexual content. It seems to to be working though because the mindless sheep keep eating it up and you have to be stupid to not realise it fails as being good fap material.
